modName: Harvesting Crops Will Always Give a Seed
modShortDescription: Sets parameters in blocks.xml so harvested plants always drop seeds.
modDescription:
Sets parameters in blocks.xml so harvested plants always drop [seeds](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-farming/).

**[Download](https://github.com/pahbi/7DTD_Modlets/raw/main/alwaysSeed.zip)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/26048-a20-modlets-lotl-perk-fast-plant-growth-super-iron-pickaxe/).

**Credits:** [Pahbi](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/pahbi/)
